content: Our project is delayed - what is the execution plan?

1. Assess the cause of the delay and address it promptly to minimize impact.
2. Revise timelines if necessary, ensuring that all team members are aware of the new deadlines, including the rescheduled board meeting date (November 12).
3. Implement contingency plans as needed, prioritizing tasks to ensure project completion and continued progress. Encourage open communication between teams to streamline collaboration and expedite resolution of any arising issues.
We keep missing deadlines, what needs to change?

1. Improve time management by prioritizing tasks and setting realistic timelines.
2. Enhance collaboration across teams to streamline workflows and reduce bottlenecks.
3. Regularly review progress and adjust strategies as needed to ensure timely delivery of projects.
